meanings.definition: Chilopods: A class of arthropods comprising the centipedes.
meanings.sent1: I saw chilopods crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The chilopods in the garden were quite fast.
meanings.sent3: The chilopods had a race to see who could reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: The chilopods moved like a swift army across the forest floor.
meanings.sent5: The chilopods with their many legs looked like tiny warriors on a mission.

meanings.definition: Chilopods: Any member of the class Chilopoda, including centipedes.
meanings.sent1: Do you think chilopods are interesting creatures?
meanings.sent2: The chilopods found in the backyard were quite large.
meanings.sent3: The chilopods threw a party in the garden last night.
meanings.sent4: The chilopods scurried around like a bustling community.
meanings.sent5: The chilopods seemed to dance in unison as they moved together.
